data.id: Code for Philly/Reach: SMS Hotline & Integrated Case Management System

links.self: /organizations/Code for Philly/projects/Reach: SMS Hotline & Integrated Case Management System.json

attributes.description: This is an SMS Hotline platform developed to facilitate a Warm Handoff to treatment services for overdose survivors. Reach connects people in need with service professionals at any hour of the day and across geographic barriers using SMS.
attributes.name: Reach: SMS Hotline & Integrated Case Management System
